meanings.sent1: She was gibbering with excitement about the upcoming party.
meanings.sent2: The child was gibbering in his sleep, dreaming vividly.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started gibbering in response to the music playing.
meanings.sent4: The engine malfunctioned, gibbering loudly like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The old radio was gibbering static, unable to tune in any station.

meanings.sent1: The gibbering of the monkeys echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't understand the gibbering of the crowd at the market.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's gibbering on stage had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the chaos, all she could hear was the gibbering of voices.
meanings.sent5: The late-night radio show was filled with eerie gibbering callers.
